umd_vision.barcode package¶

Submodules¶

umd_vision.barcode.reader module¶

This module interfaces OpenCV images to a barcode analyzer

class umd_vision.barcode.reader.Analyzer[source]¶

Provides an interface between an image and barcode analysis tools

analyze_image(image, verbose=True, show=False)[source]¶

Receives an image and processes it for barcodes. Returns the barcodes it finds and optionally draws a square and text in-place on ‘image’.

Note

When not needed, it is more efficient to have show=False. Use show=True for debugging.

Parameters:
  • image (np.ndarray) – An image
  • verbose (true) – print to console the barcode info
  • show (true) – draw the original image in place
Returns:

list of Decoded: The values decoded from barcodes.
Return type:

obj
draw_barcode_text(image, barcodes)[source]¶

Draws in text the barcode number in the image in place. Returns None.

Parameters:
  • image (np.ndarray) – An image
  • barcodes (obj) – list of Decoded: The values decoded from barcodes.
draw_square_on_barcodes(image, barcodes)[source]¶

Draws a green square on the barcode position(s) in the image in place. Returns None

Parameters:
  • image (np.ndarray) – An image
  • barcodes (obj) – list of Decoded: The values decoded from barcodes.
fast_draw_square_and_text(image, barcodes)[source]¶

barcode_reader
